attributes.action: Give Sir Norman Wisdom back his Dignity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Norman Wisdom has been moved to Abbotswood nursing home in Ballasalla,, his family are not allowing anyone to visit him and they have sold his Flat, Cars & Property  - We the public would love Norman to Return to his own home with 24hr care and support.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
